title: Mayo Clinic Alix School of Medicine - Mayo Clinic College of Medicine & Science

description: Mayo Clinic School of Medicine offers top-ranked M.D. and M.D.-Ph.D. training at Mayo Clinic's campuses in Minnesota, Arizona, and Florida.
sitename: Mayo Clinic College of Medicine and Science
cleaned_text: Commencement 2023 This May, we celebrated graduating medical students from Mayo Clinic Alix School of Medicine as they completed their medical school training and moved on to residencies. Revisit the 2023 commencement ceremonies at campus locations in Arizona, Florida, and Minnesota. See speaker information, agendas, and replay the livestreams. [Learn more
